trans-unit.source: The abstract base class from which the workflow data member support class <xref:System.Activities.Variable%601> derives.
trans-unit.target: A classe base abstrata da qual o membro de dados de fluxo de trabalho dar suporte à classe <xref:System.Activities.Variable%601> deriva.

trans-unit.source: Initializes and returns new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa e retorna a nova instância do <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"> </xref> classe.
O nome para o <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"> </xref>.
O tipo para o <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"> </xref>.
As opções de configuração para o <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"> </xref>.
A nova variável.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityWithResult"></xref> that represents the default value for this <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityWithResult"> </xref> que representa o valor padrão para este <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"> </xref>.
O valor padrão para este <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"></xref> using the specified <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor da <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"> </xref> usando especificado <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityContext"> </xref>.
O contexto de execução atual.
O valor de <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"> </xref>.
Gets the <xref href="System.Activities.Location"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The activity context of the executing activity.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de atividade da atividade em execução.
O local para este <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Activities.VariableModifiers"></xref> value for this <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Activities.VariableModifiers"> </xref> valor <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é somente leitura em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: If the value is set at runtime, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor é definido em tempo de execução, um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>é gerada.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: The variable modifier value for this <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor variável modificador <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é somente leitura em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: If the value is set at runtime, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor é definido em tempo de execução, um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>é gerada.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>
O nome do <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"> </xref>.
Obtém o nome do <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"> </xref>.
O nome do <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"></xref> using the specified <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Define o valor da <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"> </xref> usando especificado <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityContext"> </xref>.
O contexto de execução atual.
O novo valor.
